es.ubu.lsi.perikymata

Class MainApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • es.ubu.lsi.perikymata.MainApp

  • public class MainApp
extends javafx.application.Application
    Controller for the main application, contains the data that needs to be accessed by any of the other windows and has common operations, like navigation between windows or data access.
    Author:
    Sergio Chico Carrancio, Andres Miguel Teran

        disablePerikymataCount - true/false for disable perikymata count breadcrumb
